# PKAddPassButtonStyle

**Enumeration**

The appearance of the buttons that can be created using the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPassButton/addPassButtonWithStyle:] method.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PKAddPassButtonStyle
```

## Constants

- **PKAddPassButtonStyle.black**: A black button with white lettering.
- **PKAddPassButtonStyle.blackOutline**: A black button with a light outline.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
